```{r, include = FALSE, message = FALSE, echo = FALSE, cache = FALSE}
library(devtools)
load_all('~/git/amphidata/')

amphi_load_packages(
  update_packages = FALSE)

### Carrega de dades
df_v <- load_dimensions_vazquez(
  filtrar_edifici = 'amphitheater',
  filtrar_provincia = NULL,
  filtrar_pais = NULL,
  seleccionar_columnes = NULL,
  format_llarg = FALSE,
  etiquetes = TRUE)

### Resum de la totalitat de les dades
tab_df_v <- tab_summary(
    df = df_v,
    grup_by = c('nom', 'etiq_pais_i', 'lb_pais3_i', 'etiq_provincia_i', 'lb_provincia_i', 'etiq_provincia_ii'),
    addicio_info = NULL,
    seleccio_variables = c(
      contains('arena'), contains('general'), -contains('perimetre'),
      ratio_arena, nombre_places),
    stats_adicionals = FALSE,
    sd_num = NULL,
    q_lower = NULL,
    q_upper = NULL,
    na.rm = TRUE,
    bind_rows = TRUE,
    digits = 2) %>%
  select(nom, starts_with('etiq_'), starts_with('lb_'), variable, median) %>%
  pivot_wider(
    names_from = variable,
    values_from = median)


```

# Stats

## Row - Dimensions by Vàzquez {width = 70%}
### Column {width = 100%}
```{r, message = FALSE, echo = FALSE}
#| label: table-all-vazquez
#| title: Dimensions amfiteatres segons Vázquez

# Define colors and cuts for styling
rampa_color <- colorRampPalette(c('#B0E0E6', 'white', '#E9967A'))(20)

cuts_arena <- seq(
  from = min(tab_df_v[['superficie_arena']], na.rm = TRUE),
  to = max(tab_df_v[['superficie_arena']], na.rm = TRUE),
  length.out = 19)

cuts_general <- seq(
  from = min(tab_df_v[['superficie_general']], na.rm = TRUE),
  to = max(tab_df_v[['superficie_general']], na.rm = TRUE),
  length.out = 19)

cuts_aforament <- seq(
  from = min(tab_df_v[['nombre_places']], na.rm = TRUE),
  to = max(tab_df_v[['nombre_places']], na.rm = TRUE),
  length.out = 19)

DT::datatable(
  tab_df_v %>%
    dplyr::mutate(
      nom = stringr::str_to_title(nom)) %>%
    dplyr::mutate_at(
      vars(starts_with('amplada'), starts_with('alcada')), 
      ~ round(., digits = 1)) %>%
    dplyr::mutate_at(
      vars(starts_with('superficie'), starts_with('ratio')), 
      ~ round(., digits = 2)) %>%
    dplyr::mutate_at(
      vars(starts_with('etiq_')), 
      ~ as.factor(.)) %>%
    dplyr::select(
      nom,
      starts_with('etiq_'), 
      amplada_arena, alcada_arena, 
      amplada_general, alcada_general, 
      starts_with('superficie'), 
      ratio_arena, nombre_places),
    colnames = c(
      'Nom' = 'nom',
      'País' = 'etiq_pais_i',
      'Província' = 'etiq_provincia_i',
      'Regió' = 'etiq_provincia_ii',
      'Amplada arena (m)' = 'amplada_arena',
      'Alçada arena (m)' = 'alcada_arena',
      'Amplada general (m)' = 'amplada_general',
      'Alçada general (m)' = 'alcada_general',
      'Superfície arena (m2)' = 'superficie_arena',
      'Superfície general (m2)' = 'superficie_general',
      'Ratio arena' = 'ratio_arena',
      'Aforament' = 'nombre_places'),
    extensions = 'Buttons',
    filter = 'top',
    options = list(
      pageLength = 10,
      lengthMenu = c(5, 10, 25, 50, 100),
      autoWidth = TRUE,
      scrollX = TRUE,
      dom = 'Bfrtip',
      buttons = list(
        list(extend = 'csv', text = 'CSV'),
        list(extend = 'excel', text = 'XLSX'),
        list(extend = 'colvis', text = 'Ocultar Columnes')),
    caption = 'Dimensions d\'amfiteatres segons Golvin (1988)')) %>%
  formatStyle(
    columns = 'Superfície arena (m2)',
    backgroundColor = styleInterval(
      cuts = cuts_arena, 
      values = rampa_color),
    backgroundSize = '100% 90%',
    backgroundRepeat = 'no-repeat',
    backgroundPosition = 'center') %>%
  formatStyle(
    columns = 'Superfície general (m2)',
    backgroundColor = styleInterval(
      cuts = cuts_general, 
      values = rampa_color),
    backgroundSize = '100% 90%',
    backgroundRepeat = 'no-repeat',
    backgroundPosition = 'center') %>%
  formatStyle(
    columns = 'Aforament',
    backgroundColor = styleInterval(
      cuts = cuts_aforament, 
      values = rampa_color),
    backgroundSize = '100% 90%',
    backgroundRepeat = 'no-repeat',
     backgroundPosition = 'center')

```

# Distribució

## Column - Nombre amfiteatres by Vàzquez {width = 70%}

```{r}
#| label: distrb-vazquez
#| title: Distribució amfiteatres segons provincia i país
p_01_vazquez <- tab_df_v %>%
    count(
      lb_pais3_i, lb_provincia_i,
      name = 'n_amphi') %>%
    dplyr::mutate(
      lb_pais3_i = forcats::fct_reorder(
        lb_pais3_i, n_amphi,
        .fun = max,
        .desc = FALSE),
      n_amphi_cat = cut(
        n_amphi,
        breaks = c(0, 2, 5, 10, 25, Inf),
        labels = c('[1, 2]', '[3, 5]', '[6, 10]', '[11, 25]', '> 25'),
        right = TRUE,
        include.lowest = TRUE)) %>%
  ggplot(
      aes(
        x = lb_provincia_i,
        y = lb_pais3_i,
        text = paste('Provincia:', lb_provincia_i, '<br>País:', lb_pais3_i, '<br>N:', n_amphi)
        )) + 
  geom_point(
      aes(
        size = n_amphi_cat,
        fill = n_amphi_cat),
      shape = 21,
      color = 'black',
      stroke = 0.25,
      alpha = 0.5) + 
  scale_size_manual(
    name = 'Nombre d\'amfiteatres',
    values = c(2.5, 5, 7.5, 10, 12.5, 15),
    drop = FALSE) + 
  scale_fill_manual(
    name = 'Nombre d\'amfiteatres',
    values = viridis::viridis(n = 6, option = 'D', direction = -1),
    drop = FALSE) + 
  theme_minimal() + 
  labs(
    x = 'Província Romana',
    y = 'País Modern') + 
    theme(
      axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 90, hjust = 1),
      axis.text.y = element_text(size = 10),
      legend.position = 'bottom',
      legend.direction = 'horizontal',
      legend.title = element_text(size = 10),
      legend.text = element_text(size = 8),
      plot.margin = margin(10, 10, 10, 10))

plotly::ggplotly(p_01_vazquez, tooltip = 'text')
```

## Column - Nombre amfiteatres segons provincia i país {width = 30%}
```{r}
#| label: table-vazquez
#| title: Nombre amfiteatres segons provincia i país

DT::datatable(
  tab_df_v %>%
    count(
      etiq_pais_i, etiq_provincia_i,
      name = 'n_amphi') %>%
    dplyr::mutate(
      perc_total = round(n_amphi / sum(n_amphi) * 100, digits = 2)) %>%
    group_by(etiq_pais_i) %>%
    dplyr::mutate(
      perc_pais = round(n_amphi / sum(n_amphi) * 100, digits = 2)) %>%
    ungroup() %>%
    group_by(etiq_provincia_i) %>%
    dplyr::mutate(
      perc_provincia = round(n_amphi / sum(n_amphi) * 100, digits = 2)) %>%
    ungroup() %>%
    dplyr::mutate_at(
      vars(starts_with('etiq_')), 
      ~ as.factor(.)) %>%
    arrange(etiq_pais_i, desc(n_amphi)),
  colnames = c(
    'País' = 'etiq_pais_i',
    'Província' = 'etiq_provincia_i',
    'N' = 'n_amphi',
    '% Total' = 'perc_total', 
    '% País' = 'perc_pais', 
    '% Província' = 'perc_provincia'),
  extensions = 'Buttons',
  filter = 'top',
  options = list(
    pageLength = 10,
    lengthMenu = c(5, 10, 25, 50, 100),
    autoWidth = TRUE,
    scrollX = TRUE,
    dom = 'Bfrtip',
    buttons = list(
      list(extend = 'csv', text = 'CSV'),
      list(extend = 'excel', text = 'XLSX'),
      list(extend = 'colvis', text = 'Ocultar Columnes')),
  caption = 'Nombre i percentatges d\'amfiteatres segons Vàzquez')) %>%
  formatStyle(
    columns = c('% Total', '% País', '% Província'),
    backgroundColor = styleInterval(
      cuts = seq(0, 100, length.out = 9), 
      values = colorRampPalette(c('#B0E0E6', 'white', '#E9967A'))(10)),
    backgroundSize = '100% 90%',
    backgroundRepeat = 'no-repeat',
    backgroundPosition = 'center')
```
